title: Months of prep and non-stop work: How hotels made room for success
description: The hospitality industry in Delhi ensured a comfortable stay for G20 delegates during the summit. Over 2,000 room nights were booked in top hotels, including Taj, ITC Maurya, The Lalit, and Le Meridien. The catering at Bharat Mandapam was handled by ITC chefs, who delivered over 100,000 covers and provided a variety of cuisines.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
